JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Laser Machine Operator - Staermose Industry A/S
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Staermose Industry is looking for an experienced laser machine operator for our sheet metal department.

The job
The job consists of operating the laser machine. This means monitoring the planned programs and making sure that the machine always runs smoothly and efficiently. You process the customer orders and make sure to deliver according to specification, quality measures and on time. You handle adjustments to the machine programs and participate in planned machine maintenance. You work both independently and in close cooperation with two or more colleagues in the sheet metal department.
The position is 37 hours per week. We work in shifts, 4-5 days per week.

Experience
• At least 3 years of experience running a sheet metal laser cutting machine
• Skilled as industrial technician, industrial operator, machine operator or similar
• You work with good energy and can keep a good overview
• You have a positive attitude
• You understand and speak English or Danish

We run a smooth onboarding process and can support you with registration in Denmark and search for accommodation situated close to the company.

If this position is interesting to you, send your application with any attachments to job@staermoseindustry.com.
Interviews will be conducted online if necessary.

If you have any questions, please contact HR partner Tine Westergaard Clausen, tine@staermoseindustry.com .

About Staermose Industry
Staermose Industry A/S was established in 1979. Today, Staermose Industry A/S is a sub-supplier to a large part of the world market for heat exchanger manufacturers. In addition to producing insulation jackets, Staermose Industry A/S specializes in supplying cut and machined steel sheets, steel structures, pipes, cassettes, cabinets, etc. With a targeted strategy and ambition to grow further, the company has grown strongly over the past 10 years.
Read more at www.staermoseindustry.com.
